overview: SeeZee Studios provides web development, AI systems, dashboards, and automation as the primary entry point, backed by ongoing technical support and consulting as long-term partnership services.
serviceHierarchy: Web development and systems are the front door. Ongoing support and consulting retain clients long-term. AI and automation are upsells.

services.name: Web Development & Systems
services.description: Custom websites, web applications, dashboards, and digital infrastructure. This is the main entry point — clients come to us for a website, app, or system.
details: Custom responsive websites with modern frameworks

marketingWebsite.name: Marketing Website
marketingWebsite.description: 5-10 custom pages, mobile responsive, contact forms, SEO

ecommerce.name: E-commerce Store
ecommerce.description: Product catalogs, shopping cart, checkout, payment processing, inventory

webApp.name: Web Application
webApp.description: User auth, custom dashboards, database integration, full-stack

services.pricingApproach: Projects are custom-scoped. Typical builds range from $1k-$5k for most small businesses. Larger system builds go $5k-$15k+. We don't list rigid prices — every project is different.
services.differentiator: We don't just make websites. We build systems that work as part of your organization's infrastructure and stay with you long-term.

services.name: Ongoing Technology Partnership
services.description: After building your system, we stay as your technology partner. Monthly support, updates, improvements, and strategic guidance. This is how we retain clients.
details: Hour-based support pool — buy hours, use them on anything

hourPacks.description: Need more hours? Buy packs anytime.

services.differentiator: We don't just build it. We stay with you. Your technology partner, not a one-time vendor.

services.name: Technical Support & Consulting
services.description: On-site and remote help for real-world technical issues. Technology decision support and strategy. This builds trust and retains relationships.
details: On-site support for schools, nonprofits, and local organizations
services.differentiator: We started doing this before we were a company. Real experience in real environments, not just theory.

services.name: Automation & AI Solutions
services.description: Practical automation and AI tools that support real workflows. Offered as an add-on or upsell once trust exists. Never hype-first.
services.differentiator: AI used only where it adds real value. Never AI-for-AI's-sake.

audiences.name: Local Businesses
audiences.description: Small and local businesses that need a website, app, or system and value long-term relationships over one-time transactions. This is the primary target.

audiences.name: Schools & Education
audiences.description: K-12 schools, districts, and educational organizations needing reliable tech support and modern systems.

audiences.name: Nonprofits
audiences.description: Mission-driven organizations that need technology to work without enterprise budgets.

audiences.name: Community Organizations
audiences.description: Local groups, faith-based organizations, and service providers serving their communities.

paymentInfo.paymentPlans: Available — we work to find a structure that fits your budget

timeline.complex: 4-12 weeks for web apps and system builds
